column120: selected Audio Track Fullscreen This is a modal window. No compatible source was found for this media. Title: Discrepancy in Product: Packaging vs. Contents  Review: I recently purchased the All Night Ultra Cover XL pads with great anticipation
column121: as I had heard positive reviews about their absorbency and comfort. However
column123: I was disappointed to find that the pads inside were the regular-sized ones instead of the advertised ultra cover XL pads.  The packaging prominently displayed the ultra cover XL branding
column124: which led me to believe I was getting a product designed for heavy flow and maximum coverage. Unfortunately
column125: the actual contents didn\'t align with my expectations. The regular-sized pads are not suitable for my needs during heavy flow nights
column126: which is why I specifically opted for the larger size.  This discrepancy between the packaging and the product itself was frustrating
column127: to say the least. It not only wasted my time but also left me without the product I thought I was purchasing. I hope the company addresses this issue to prevent other customers from facing similar disappointments.  I urge potential buyers to carefully inspect the product inside upon purchase
column128: especially if they\'re relying on specific sizing or features. While I can\'t speak to the performance of the All Night Ultra Cover XL pads themselves
column129: I\'m left questioning the credibility of the product\'s packaging accuracy.'
